protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"8kcjl","text":"BS, Mg/Ca- Kester et al. 1967; Giovannoi \u0026 Stingl 2007 Fe- Carini et al. 2013; Giovannoni \u0026 Stingl 2007 P- Justic et al. 1995; Dagg et al. 2004 TM/Vit- w/ modification from Carini et al., 2013; also see Moore et al. 2007; Dagg et al. 2004; Rabalais et al. 1996; Henson et al. 2016; S Belviso, SK Kim, and F Rassoulzadegan, Production of dimethylsulfonium propionate (DMSP) and dimethylsulfide (DMS) by a microbial food web, Limnology and (1990). 3. Zindler-Schlundt, C, H Lutterbeck, and S Endres, Environmental control of dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) cycling under ocean acidification, Environmental (2015). 4. Y Cai, L Guo, X Wang, and AK Mojzis, The source and distribution of dissolved and particulate organic matter in the bay of st. louis, northern gulf of mexico, Estuarine (2012). 5. Motard-Cˆot´e, J, DJ Kieber, A Rellinger, and RP Kiene, Influence of the mississippi river plume and non-bioavailable DMSP on dissolved DMSP turnover in the northern gulf of mexico, Environmental Chemistry (2015). 6. NA Kamennaya, M Chernihovsky, and AF Post, The cyanate utilization capacity of marine unicellular cyanobacteria, Limnology and Oceanography (2008). 7. Z Liu and S Liu, High phosphate concentrations accelerate bacterial peptide decomposition in hypoxic bottom waters of the northern gulf of mexico, Environmental science \u0026 technology (2015). 8. RR Malmstrom and RP Kiene, Identification and enumeration of bacteria assimilating dimethylsulfoniopropionate (DMSP) in the north atlantic and gulf of mexico, Limnology and (2004). 9. RR Malmstrom, RP Kiene, and MT Cottrell, Contribution of SAR11 bacteria to dissolved dimethylsulfoniopropionate and amino acid uptake in the north atlantic ocean, Applied and (2004). 10. status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cep27","text":"Prepare the following stocks prior to medium assembly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9o64r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fql1v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b44pm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdpe2","text":"Using an acid-washed and autoclaved one Liter screw-top Pyrex bottle, combine basic salts in 997.4095 mL MilliQ-filtered water. (stock volumes subtracted)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"667n4","text":"Stocks should be added in a Biosafety cabinet or hood with appropriate ventilation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27cae","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etrnp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlid5","text":"Swirl or invert media between stock additions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vshf","text":"Mix continuously with stir bar or invert the tightly capped bottle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95slm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blsev","text":"Each chemical should be fully dissolved before next addition. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnul0","text":"Add (per Liter): ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6mm8","text":"10 μL Trace Metal Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mthd","text":"10µL Vitamin Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62cr5","text":"20 µL Amino Acid Mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1h9oo","text":"50 µL Misc. Mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ja5u","text":"500 µL Inorganic Nitrogen Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"815dc","text":"0.5 µL Fatty Acid Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"964gl","text":"1mL Iron Mix ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dd6kj","text":"1mL Phosphate Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhvv4","text":"Iron mix (1,000x)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fi04","text":"Trace Metals (100,000x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rvgr","text":"Vitamins (100,000x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c324","text":"AA mix (500x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"926tb","text":"Misc. mix (20,000x)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"au5au","text":"Phosphate mix (1000x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4br2g","text":"Inorganic Nitrogen mix (2,000x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c34b","text":"Fatty Acid mix (2,000,000x) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3orp8","text":"When in the biosafety cabinet or laminar fume hood filter-sterilize medium using a 0.2 µm filter into another sterilized one Liter Pyrex bottle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":83,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75kcp","text":"pH and record.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jpb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87uvb","text":"Media can be stored at room temp (~25 C°) in the tightly closed Pyrex bottle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15fsl","text":"Filter sterilize stocks using 0.2 µM PES filter. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: SJB Artificial Seawater Medium Protocol
